name: Drunk Hobo Killer
description: Hello, I'm Eli, This is my first game: Drunk Hobo Killer, yes it is a big file,but the world is huge,you get lots of weapons, there is a crowd of hobos,trees, and also a shed and lake. You can do anything, just mess around. Donations appreciated! (for windows only right now!) THE DONATIONS FOR MY GAMES KEEP ME ALIVE, AS IT IS MY JOB
